BadgeDetail.Name: Problem Solving
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated that they are able to take a methodical approach to problem solving. They are able to identify and clearly define the underlying problem and recognise the resources available to them to solve it. They are then able consider a range of options and design an effective solution. Finally, they can implement their chosen solution to solve the problem.

Task.Title: Solved
Task.Body: Describe a recent scenario where you have demonstrated your problem solving skills. State the underlying problem, what resources you had available to solve it, the alternative options you identified, and your final solution.
Task.HtmlBody: Describe a recent scenario where you have demonstrated your problem solving skills. State the underlying problem, what resources you had available to solve it, the alternative options you identified, and your final solution.
Task.TextileBody: Describe a recent scenario where you have demonstrated your problem solving skills. State the underlying problem, what resources you had available to solve it, the alternative options you identified, and your final solution.
